channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
when i run moparscape i get this error: ''Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape
To fix this try the following (in oder):
1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
2:Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tool->internet options
3: Try rebooting your computer
5: Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu''
ive got jdk update 2 and have tried everything else wat do i do?
help me plz

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @ps2man70 ps2man70
item.description:
@ps2man70 wrote:

this is how u do it go to… c: click on windows and at the top look for mpr file and delete it so when u go on moparscape it downloads everything again and it works! honest

Read full topic
